body.name: Techwood Hot Plate Portable Electric Stove 1500W Countertop Single Burner with Adjustable Temperature & Stay Cool Handles, 7.5” Cooktop for Dorm Office/Home/Camp, Compatible for All Cookwares
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🍳 MINI SIZE & PORTABLE - Techwood Hot Plate used compact and flat design makes it perfect for dorms, studios, RV/caravans, work, camping, everyday use or as an extra cooking appliance in the busy kitchen. Because of its small and light size, you can easily to used in confined spaces or anywhere.

🍳 MULTIPURPOSE - Techwood electric stove heats efficiently to cook a variety of foods such as warm sauces, scrambled eggs, grilled cheese, soup, pasta, vegetables and so much more. Also you can use it as extra burner to keep food warm.

🍳 ALL TYPES OF COOKWARE - Techwood single burner can be used with any type of cookware in your home, such as aluminium pans, copper pans, cast lron frying pans and non-magnetic stainless steel pans can heats cookware efficiently with minimal heat loss. And stainless steel body to withstand frequent use. Simply wipe with a clean cloth when cool.

🍳 POWERFUL & SAFE - Powered by 1500W, it heats up food faster than conventional cooking ranges. Modern brushed stainless steel housing. Non-slip feet for stable cooking. Solid stainless steel riveted handle stays cool and comfortable during cooking. Ergonomic design ensuring safe transport and stays cool on the stovetop.

🍳 WARRANTY - Techwood offers an excellent fan-favorite 18-month warranty and friendly customer service, our customer service will be online all the time to help you. All Techwood products are protected by US Product Liability Insurance. See the instruction manual for details.
body.description: EASY COOKING & DON'T WORRY EASY COOKING Techwood hot plate is powerful to use as an additional solid burner to warm sauces, boil water, cook pasta, make soups, and vegetables and do so much more, just as if it were a normal stove. DON'T WORRY Techwood hot plates can be used with all types of cookware, which is more efficient and heats the cooking food to make the food more delicious.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Techwood portable cooktop provides cooking flexibility to your kitchen.It is extremely suitable for the moment that when you need an extra burner or microwave, or as a substitute kitchen stove to entertain a large group. Harmless infrared heat, cool to touch handles and portable design works great or college students in dorms, young adults living on their own, people with small spaces or RV’s/caravans, adventure-seekers, road-trippers, campers, and anti-microwave folks.

PRODUCT FEATURES Double burner 120V, 1300W + 500W of power.Heating fast, the principle of electric heating with Cast iron material makes heating faster.Adjustable thermostatsNon-slip rubber feet ensure that the hot pate stays firmly in place for safe use.

INDISPENSABLE ASSISTANT IN YOUR KITCHEN Cooking with this portable electric cooktop, prepare a meal for yourself to healing homesick.Even though in office, it is powerful enough to finish a meal quickly and compact enough to entertain a group.All of these troubles are a piece of cake for our Techwood countertop burner. HARMLESS & PROTABLE DESIGN Works great for college students in dorms, small spaces or RV’s/caravans, adventure-seekers, road-trippers, campers, and anti-microwave folks.Simply turn the control knob to the desired position, it will maintain the steady temperature for your cuisine until the setting is changed.It is used to care about over heat and avoid potential hazard. HEATING FAST WITH CAST IRON & EASY TO CLEAN Thread circulation heating on cast iron hot plate, which is good for heat preservationBlack cast iron design makes cleaning easier.To clean, simply wipe the machine with a clean and damp cloth when cool.

EASY COOKING & DON'T WORRY EASY COOKING Techwood hot plate is powerful to use as an additional solid burner to warm sauces, boil water, cook pasta, make soups, and vegetables and do so much more, just as if it were a normal stove. DON'T WORRY Techwood hot plates can be used with all types of cookware, which is more efficient and heats the cooking food to make the food more delicious. ATTN : preheating before heating, will make heating faster Never use harsh abrasive or steel wool pads to clean. Never immerse any part of the burner in water. In the first time of use the machine will give off a smell of smoke for the protective coating.

ATTENTION: The hot plate has a overheating protection and thermostat, it will automatically power off when the temperature is too high. It's a normal phenomenon. Please follow the instructions to use is no problem.The temperature ranges from 392F to 1162F and it will take about 10-15 minutes for a four-quart pot of water. Please cover the pot lid when boiling water.It takes about 20 minutes for the burner to cool completely, which helps keep the food warm for a long time.Please don't touch the body of the burner during use, beacuse the surface of the burner is made of stainless steel, which will cause heat conduction.Never use harsh abrasives, steel wool pads or caustic cleansers on any part of the hot plate as they may scratch the surface or damage the unit.When turn on for the first time, the appliance may give off vapours for up to 15 minutes. This is due to the protective substances on the heating elements. There is no need for concern and the vapours will dissipate with use.To make the burner work quickly: 1. Preheat before use; 2. Use a pan to cook as much as possible; 3. Use a lid when cooking. Since the hot plate emits heat when in use, please place it on a high temperature resistant surface!

ATTENTION: The hot plate has a overheating protection and thermostat, it will automatically power off when the temperature is too high. It's a normal phenomenon. Please follow the instructions to use is no problem.The temperature ranges from 392F to 1162F and it will take about 10-15 minutes for a four-quart pot of water. Please cover the pot lid when boiling water.It takes about 20 minutes for the burner to cool completely, which helps keep the food warm for a long time.Please don't touch the body of the burner during use, beacuse the surface of the burner is made of stainless steel, which will cause heat conduction.Never use harsh abrasives, steel wool pads or caustic cleansers on any part of the hot plate as they may scratch the surface or damage the unit.When turn on for the first time, the appliance may give off vapours for up to 15 minutes. This is due to the protective substances on the heating elements. There is no need for concern and the vapours will dissipate with use.To make the burner work quickly: 1. Preheat before use; 2. Use a pan to cook as much as possible; 3. Use a lid when cooking. Since the hot plate emits heat when in use, please place it on a high temperature resistant surface!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works, it fits the counter space, it's light weight
reviews.reviewText: Very light weight, works well. One small plate and one large plate.Compared to other hotplates I have used and owned, this one is the best. It takes a moment to warm up compared to one or two I have owned but it gets very hot and remains hot a long while after turning it off so you're still able to cook on residual heat for some time.The handles remain cool and the wire is pretty long compared to other models.We'll see how long it lasts. I am mean and brutal to my hotplates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific hot plate side addition cook surface!
reviews.reviewText: This little hot plate cook top is great and I use this all the time next to my BBQ / Smoker setup. The element heats up quickly and evenly dissipates the heat. I use this to cook beans, boil veggies and sear steaks using pots, pans and skillets. Very sturdy design that is easy to store and very easy to clean. Great product and a must have for additional cook top needs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works really well
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. Surface gets much hotter than the cheaper hot plates and does a better job evenly heating pans. The only thing to be aware of is that the plate surface is a little slippery so some types of pans will slide around when you need to stir whatever you’re cooking. I noticed that cast iron pans don’t move around so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great hot plate
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for travel because sometimes hotels or airbnb's only have induction stove top and those don't work with my coffee pot so I got this and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, Compact, and Powerful Little Burner
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after reading several reviews. I recently moved into an older home from the 1920s, and the range that was in here just had to go. I am still renovating and needing something simple to help do some light cooking. After giving it a go, I am so impressed!!Positives * Love the look, I would love a black stainless but the stainless steel is a nice look overall. * Boiled water VERY fast for me, I read some reviews where it was iffy for them but I had no issues at all. Just a medium-sized regular pot for me and it did the job very quickly. * Also was able to scramble some eggs quite quickly as well. Over all, tends to heat thoroughly for me.Negatives * I wish it had a different temperature knob on it, so you knew from "Low - High" etc. You can pretty much figure it out with ease though. * Only other negative I had was, just because I sometimes run about doing other things, I wish it had an alarm that could be set to remind that its turned on. Yes, it has a light so you can just utilize that, but I tend to set myself alarms on my phone anytime I utilize kitchen items just to make sure I remember to turn them off. Would just be a nice quality of life addition, nothing really horrible by not having one.Outside of that, I am so excited and happy to get to use this little burner. If you're looking for something at a good price point, and need a burner for anything, I would totally recommend grabbing this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nicely built but hot spots
reviews.reviewText: This unit is nicely built and even has an on/off to control both burners as well as the temperature controls. I'd rate it higher if the burners heated to the edges. Both burners only heat the center 4 or 5 inches and if your using a larger skillet the center gets hot and the outside edges stay cooler. If you use a larger size cast iron skillet the center expands with the heat and the bottom become convex raising the edges away from the burner causing even more uneven heating and destabilizing the pan . Used with small pots and pans this would be a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A most excellent two-burner electric hot plate!!
reviews.reviewText: This two-burner electric hot plate is very easy to use and looks nice in our kitchen. I bought it because our 22-year-old gas built in cooktop died and I needed something to cook on while saving up for the replacement cooktop. Have patience though, because it takes a bit for the electric burners to get hot enough to cook most things. Very good value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Title: Disappointing Experience with the Techwood 1800W Portable Electric Stove
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Techwood 1800W Portable Electric Stove with high hopes for a convenient and efficient cooking solution, but unfortunately, my experience has been less than satisfactory.One of the major drawbacks is the inconsistent heating performance. Despite the 1800W power rating, the burners seem to struggle to reach and maintain the desired temperature. Cooking times are prolonged, and achieving even heat distribution across cookware has proven to be a challenge. This inconsistency has significantly impacted the quality of my cooking, leading to frustration and disappointment.The build quality of the electric stove also leaves much to be desired. The materials used feel flimsy, and the overall construction lacks durability. The adjustable temperature control, while present, seems imprecise and unreliable, making it difficult to achieve the desired cooking results. The stay-cool handles, advertised as a feature, don't effectively dissipate heat, posing a safety concern during use.Another issue is the limited size of the 7.5" cooktop. While it may be suitable for some basic cooking tasks, it proves impractical for larger pots and pans, restricting the versatility of the appliance. This limitation was not clearly communicated in the product description, leading to unexpected challenges in preparing meals of various sizes.Furthermore, the compatibility claim with all cookwares falls short of reality. The heating elements seem to struggle with certain materials, resulting in uneven cooking and potential damage to cookware. This lack of compatibility undermines the versatility promised by the product.In terms of portability, the Techwood Electric Stove falls short of expectations. While it's marketed as a portable solution for RVs, homes, and camps, the bulkiness and awkward design make it less convenient to transport than anticipated. The lack of a secure and compact storage solution adds to the overall disappointment.In conclusion, the Techwood 1800W Portable Electric Stove has not lived up to my expectations, and I cannot recommend it based on my experience. The issues with inconsistent heating, subpar build quality, limited cooktop size, and questionable compatibility with cookware make it a less-than-ideal choice for those seeking a reliable and versatile portable cooking solution.

Its a premium quality hot plate. I wanna use it for 6 months and again write a review. I have used techwood before , 1500 w solo plate was actually really good. I wanna try this dual burner 1800 watt , so far heats really really good. It takes few minutes to heat as the metal plate is really thick and its a very nice alloy to prevent the entire device from overheating and shorting the fuse.Once hot , its just amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: This appliance is rated for 120volt operation which is not widely available in the UK.
reviews.reviewText: I am unable to test and rate the product since it is for 120v operation. In all other respects it appeared on paper to meet all my requirements and is beautifully styled and robustly constructed. Sorry if I have missed the information but I cannot see any voltage rating on your ad - only one reference to power consumption.
Easy to use. Once you get to know the way the temperature controls work, it is a great hot plate. I currently have no complaints. It has been working consistently well. Good purchase, so far.

I've had several types of electric hotplates. All others shrink compared to this one.That said, I gave it 4 stars because I have found, over time, it doesn't seem to get as hot as it did when new (had it about a year now, I think).Also, the plate is SLIGHTLY small for our large cast iron pan. We still use it but it shakes the nerves a little as the pan is not quite as stable as it should be and doesn't heat as evenly as it should (pretty evenly but still not as evenly as it should) due to the "foot" not being in good, solid contact all the way around.Still, we are able to make homemade tortillas, omelettes, bacon, crepes, etc. quite successfully even though the plate is a touch (couple mm?) small.I am not sorry we bought it. Even a year later I watch for one I think might have a bigger plate and stay as hot but have not found one that compares.
Not for heavy cooking.. I returned it thx
